snippet.title: World Cup Italia 90 Gameplay Sega Genesis Mega Drive Uruguay v Spain
snippet.description:
A video of me playing the Sega Genesis Mega Drive game World Cup Italia 90 (Also known as Sega Soccer). This was the very first football game I owned. If you want a challenge and own this game, try and win the world cup without losing a goal. I have done it with China, a little tricky. In this video - Uruguay v Spain (friendly) and the awesomeness of the music whenever you play as a South American team on the game =)
Any other games videos you would like to see? Let me know! Leave a comment. Many Thanks =)
